title: Textile, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: bark, raffia
Technique: bark beaten and/or chewed, pieced with raffia stitching
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Fragment of bark cloth with a center field of alternating black and natural triangles, with borders on two sides of natural color with a single black stripe in the center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 19th century.Medium: bark, raffia
Technique: bark beaten and/or chewed, pieced with raffia stitching. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1957-110-6.
